The Compendium

What is the Compendium

If you want extra documentation about the universe of Last Contact that information can be found here. While not directly related to the story it can help give some specifics that help provide a little more detail or context.

As I get questions that are not answered by the Last Contact story I'll either include them in the story or make a compendium entry and add it here.
